text: So, the suggested timeline for you to complete Module 2 looks a little bit like this. Part 5 will take you roughly 3 hours and 15 minutes. Part 6 will take 3 and a half hours. Part 7, 3 hours and 15 minutes and Part 8, 4 hours. Now again, notice how I've broken it down into Principle Learning, Summary and Concept As you will notice, the big difference between Module 1 and 2 is we're going to be spending a lot more time inside our playbooks. It's time for me to make sure not only that you understand the principles we're dealing with, but that you can now start finding strategies that you can implement from the markets into your playbook, ensuring that you're developing these strategies as we The total time expected to complete Module 2 will be roughly 14 hours. Do not worry if you finish this sooner or longer, the important thing is that you understand all the principles, concepts, practical examples and strategies. If you do that, once you've completed it, you can then move on to Module 3.
